pkgmetadata.longdescription: LaTeX Wrappers for R Users // Provides the functionality to write LaTeX code from within R without having to learn LaTeX. Functionality also exists to create HTML and Markdown code. While the functionality still exists to write complete documents with lazyWeave, it is generally easier to do so with with markdown and knitr. lazyWeave's main strength now is the ability to design custom and complex tables for reporting results.
